title: getPhyloPalette — get_phylo_palette

FALSE, colors arranged high low taxa abundance random_low TRUE, randomize color palette. FALSE, colors arranged high low taxa abundance other_color Color use aggregated taxa

title: Plot Faith's PD — plotPD
text: function iteratively removes least abundant sequence phyloseq sample, re-roots tree, calculates Faith's PD, plots results. Returns list dataframe (results$df) two different plots.

title: Plot Faith's PD — plotPD
text: results$p1 iteratively removing lowest abundance sequences per sample. done per sample basis - sequence lowest sample sample B, removed sample retained sample B lowest . multiple sequences tied lowest sample, removed - hence can jumps along x axis. results$p2 uses data criteria results$p1, except now x axis sequence count removed. X value 10 example means PD sequences abundance 10 less removed.

title: Boxplot of Beta-diversity Distances — plot_distances
text: Takes `phyloseq` object samples grouped sample data, calculates pairwise beta-diversity metrics, plots distances facets. Now returns list df can accessed $df, plot can accessed $plot.

title: Boxplot of Beta-diversity Distances — plot_distances
code: plot_distances(   p = GlobalPatterns,   m = "wunifrac",   s = "X.SampleID",   d = "SampleType" )

title: Boxplot of Beta-diversity Distances — plot_distances
text: p phyloseq object m Distance metric s Column name sample IDs d Grouping comparisons
